name: Video Store Defender
description:
Action + Carnage + A huge selection of random weapons to blast your way through waves of walking human cash bags + Dangerous authoritarian forces.

MISSION :

Video distribution is dominated by digital platforms.
Small family owned video rental stores are struggling.

           A Riot is in progress and People are looting. You must redeem
the cash from those who have shunned our redundant media outlet.

        Roll over the corpses and extract the cash

       To save the Video store, You need to collect $100,000

CONTROLS:

W A S D keys or RIGHT CLICK to move

LEFT CLICK to shoot

Hold SHIFT to run

Adjust overlay effect:

F9   None

F10 Low

F11  High

ESC to pause or exit

"Sometimes it's nice just to hide in the corner of the store and shoot customers with a harpoon gun." - Video store employee
